sentences.en: Half the undoing of the unsophisticated and natural mind is accomplished by forces wholly superhuman.
sentences.cn: 可以说,有一半涉世未深的纯洁心灵是被非人为的影响力带坏的.

sentences.en: He was confiding , good - natured, unsophisticated, companionable.
sentences.cn: 他为人坦率,一团和气, 世故不深, 蔼然可亲.

sentences.en: He was pleased that his unsophisticated friends should take his words to be his own.
sentences.cn: 他未经世故的朋友们竟把这话当作是他自己想出来的,他心中十分得意.
它是又不平凡, 又超尘脱俗, 又古色古香 吗 ?

sentences.en: It was music of a rather crude kind which unsophisticated audiences enjoyed listening to.
sentences.cn: 这是一种平民品味的听众喜欢听的简单粗糙的音乐形式。

sentences.en: Peasant family impression: Come from big mountain profundity photograph and unsophisticated!
sentences.cn: 农家印象: 来自大山深处的古朴图片!

sentences.en: She was quite unsophisticated in the ways of the world.
So unsophisticated was his mother in these matters that she believed him.
sentences.cn: 他母亲对这类事完全外行,也就相信了他的话.

sentences.en: The British are considered ill-mannered, badly dressed and unsophisticated.
sentences.cn: 英国人被认为缺乏教养、衣着邋遢、头脑简单。

sentences.en: The people living in my hometown are unsophisticated and simple.
sentences.cn: 生活在我家乡的人们都不复杂,很简单.

sentences.en: The sights of Paris bowled over the unsophisticated tourists.
sentences.cn: 巴黎景色让不谙世故的旅游者们大吃一惊.

sentences.en: The term usually refers to someone who is relatively simple and unsophisticated.
sentences.cn: 你说她是个countrybumpkin,那是什么意思?

sentences.en: This basic utilitarian model gives a relatively unsophisticated account of human behaviour.
sentences.cn: 这个实用的基础模型较为简略地解释了人类的行为。

sentences.en: To the unsophisticated ( ie naive ) mind of the average viewer.
sentences.cn: 对于一般观众的单纯心理.

sentences.en: You have a vicious, greedy, unmerciful financial wolf standing over a cowering, unsophisticated commercial lamb.
sentences.cn: 你们看到了一只凶恶的 、 贪婪的 、 残忍的金融狼,俯视着一只畏缩的 、 朴实的商业羊.

trans.tran_cn: 不复杂的，简单的，淳朴，纯朴，纯真
trans.tran_en: unsophisticated tools, methods, or processes are simple and do not have all the features of more modern ones
